nodes.text: The Vensenor Flight Academy was a prestigious starship pilot training facility on Arkanis.

The facility itself was located on board a Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Vensenor, which is how the school got its name. The Vensenor Flight Academy was a branch of Imperial flight school system, which was itself a branch to the Imperial Academy.
A notable attendee was Pash Cracken. Bythen Forral was an instructor for the Academy during the Galactic Civil War. A Rebel Alliance mole at the Academy was Gola Chall.
